description:
Explore a refreshing, brand-new area, home to 4 characters from a past entry in the series for the Nintendo 3DS™ system.

* Marriage Candidate Expansion Packs are based on past titles in the STORY OF SEASONS series, and include a new area, 2 townsfolk, and 2 marriage candidates each.

In the Windswept Falls Expansion Pack, you'll explore a new area where the breeze is always pleasant and meet 4 familiar faces from a past entry in the series for the Nintendo 3DS™ system.
name: Windswept Falls Expansion Pack
